name: Charged Chamber
description: Increases damage for the first shot in a magazine

name: Emergent Aftermath
description: Increases reload speed temporarily on kill

name: Harkonar Scope
description: Increases a sniper rifle's combo duration while aiming.

name: Primed Chamber
description: Increases damage for the first shot in a magazine

name: Sharpshooter
description: Increases energy upon a headshot kill

name: Sniper Ammo Mutation
description: Converts any unused ammo types collected into Sniper Ammo
